BOT_OWNERS_ONLY.english: This command can only be ran by the bot developers.

MISSING_PERMISSION.english: You must have the `{PERM}` permission in order to use this command.

UNKNOWN_COMMAND.english: Could not find command: `{COMMAND}`. This must be an error on the developers' end.

CURRENT_PREFIX.english: The current prefix of the bot in this server is `{PREFIX}`.

SET_PREFIX.english: Set the bot's prefix of this server to `{PREFIX}`.

NO_DATABASE_FOUND.english: An unexpected database error occured. We hope for it to get fixed soon!

GUILD_ONLY_COMMAND.english: This command can only be used within a server.

NO_REACT_PERMS.english: This bot needs the `ADD_REACTIONS` permission to use the help menu.

EXCEPTION.english: An error occurred when running this command! This error has been reported to the developers.

NO_TAGGED_CHANNELS.english: Please mention at least one channel.

NOT_CHANNEL_COMMAND.english: That command is currently not limited to any channel.

INVALID_SLASH_COMMAND.english: This slash command is not properly registered.
INVALID_SLASH_COMMAND.spanish: Este comando de barra no está registrado correctamente.
INVALID_SLASH_COMMAND.portuguese: Este comando de barra não está registrado corretamente.
INVALID_SLASH_COMMAND.russian: Эта команда косой черты не зарегистрирована должным образом.
INVALID_SLASH_COMMAND.german: Dieser Schrägstrichbefehl ist nicht richtig registriert.
INVALID_SLASH_COMMAND.dutch: Deze slash-opdracht is niet correct geregistreerd.
INVALID_SLASH_COMMAND.french: Cette commande slash n'est pas correctement enregistrée.
